authors: David L. Hawkins & Aaron C. Meadows
instructions:
**D&DNext Character Sheet**

Laid out for easy reference and all dice rolls have been formated together for easy access. Rolls prompt for misc. modifiers, just in put relevant mod and press enter.

***Useful Attributes***

HP
HP_max
HD
HD_max
AC
ACNoArmor
speed
initiative
PB (Proficiency Bonus)
spellsavedc

***Ability Scores***

strength / StrMod
dexterity / DexMod
consititution / ConMod
intelligence / IntMod
wisdom / WisMod
charisma / ChaMod
